Wisdom: الْجَفَاءُ يُفْسِدُ الْإِخَاءَ
enWisdom: Antipathy spoils brotherhood

Wisdom: الْمَلَلُ [الْمُلْكُ‏] يُفْسِدُ الْأُخُوَّةَ
enWisdom: Kingship spoils brotherhood

Wisdom: إِنْ أُحْسِنَ إِلَيْهِ جَحَدَ وَإِنْ أَحْسَنَ تَطَاوَلَ وَامْتَنَّ
enWisdom: If a favour is done to him, he is ungrateful and if he does a favour, he lengthens it and makes it seem like [a great favour and] an obligation

Wisdom: إِذَا كَثُرَتْ ذُنُوبُ الصَّدِيقِ قَلَّ السُّرُورُ بِهِ
enWisdom: When the sins of a friend increase, the joy of being with him decreases

Wisdom: إِذَا ظَهَرَ غَدْرُ الصَّدِيقِ سَهُلَ هَجْرُهُ
enWisdom: When the disloyalty of a friend becomes evident, forsaking him becomes easy

Wisdom: بِئْسَ السَّعْيُ التَّفْرِقَةُ بَيْنَ الْأَلِيفَيْنِ
enWisdom: The worst endeavour is separating two close friends

Wisdom: حَسَدُ الصَّدِيقِ مِنْ سُقْمِ الْمَوَدَّةِ
enWisdom: The jealousy of a friend is an ailment of [his] friendship

Wisdom: رُبَّ مُتَوَدِّدٍ مُتَصَنِّعٌ
enWisdom: Many a [seemingly] friendly person is only feigning [friendship]

Wisdom: رُبَّ صَدِيقٍ حَسُودٌ
enWisdom: Many a friend may be envious

Wisdom: شَرُّ النَّاسِ مَنْ سَعَى بِالْإِخْوَانِ وَنَسِيَ الْإِحْسَانَ
enWisdom: The worst person is one who slanders his brothers and forgets the favours [done to him by others]

Wisdom: غَايَةُ الْخِيَانَةِ خِيَانَةُ الْخِلِّ الْوَدُودِ وَنَقْضُ الْعُهُودِ
enWisdom: The highest form of treachery is the treachery of a beloved friend and the breaking of pledges

Wisdom: غِشُّ الصَّدِيقِ وَالْغَدْرُ بِالْمَوَاثِيقِ مِنْ خِيَانَةِ الْعَهْدِ
enWisdom: Deceiving a friend and being disloyal to one’s pledges are from [the acts of] betrayal of one’s covenant

Wisdom: قَلِيلٌ مِنَ الْإِخْوَانِ مَنْ يُنْصِفُ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: لِيَكُنْ أَبْغَضُ النَّاسِ إِلَيْكَ وَأَبْعَدُهُمْ مِنْكَ أَطْلَبُهُمْ لِمَعَايِبِ النَّاسِ
enWisdom: NULL

Wisdom: لَيْسَ لِحَقُودٍ أُخُوَّةٌ
enWisdom: There is no brotherhood for the spiteful

Wisdom: لَمْ يَسُدْ مَنِ افْتَقَرَ إِخْوَانُهُ إِلَى غَيْرِهِ
enWisdom: One whose brothers have to turn to other than him [for their needs] has not attained eminence

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ يُبَالِكَ فَهُوَ عَدُوُّكَ
enWisdom: Whoever is unconcerned about you, then he is your enemy

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَطَالَ عَلَى الْإِخْوَانِ لَمْ يُخْلِصْ لَهُ إِنْسَانٌ
enWisdom: Whoever is haughty with his brothers, nobody will be sincere with him

Wisdom: مَنْ حَفَرَ لِأَخِيهِ بِئْراً أَوْقَعَهُ اللَّهُ فِي بِئْرِهِ
enWisdom: One who digs a pit for his brother will fall into it [himself]

Wisdom: مَنْ نَاقَشَ الْإِخْوَانَ قَلَّ صَدِيقُهُ
enWisdom: One who has no brothers has no kin

Wisdom: مَنْ حَفَرَ لِأَخِيهِ الْمُؤْمِنِ بِئْراً أُوقِعَ [وَقَعَ‏] فِيهَا
enWisdom: One who digs a pit for his believing brother will fall into it [himself]

Wisdom: مَنْ لَمْ تَنْفَعْكَ حَيَاتُهُ فَعُدَّهُ فِي الْمَوْتَى
enWisdom: One whose being alive is not beneficial to you, then count him among the dead

Wisdom: مَنْ حَصَّنَ سِرَّهُ مِنْكَ فَقَدِ اتَّهَمَكَ
enWisdom: One who safeguards his secret from you has actually accused you [of being untrustworthy]

Wisdom: مَنْ أَفْشَى سِرَّكَ ضَيَّعَ أَمْرَكَ
enWisdom: One who reveals your secret has ruined your affair

Wisdom: مِنْ عَلَامَةِ [عَلَامَاتِ‏] الشَّقَاءِ غِشُّ الصَّدِيقِ
enWisdom: One of the signs of wretchedness is cheating one’s friend

Wisdom: مَا أَكْثَرَ الْإِخْوَانَ عِنْدَ الْجِفَانِ وَأَقَلَّهُمْ عِنْدَ حَادِثَاتِ الزَّمَانِ
enWisdom: It is from weak personal judgment to break ties with one’s brothers

Wisdom: لَا تُؤْثِرْ دَنِيّاً عَلَى شَرِيفٍ
enWisdom: Be careful not to associate with an evil colleague, for his association will destroy you and his companionship will ruin you

Wisdom: لَا تَجْتَمِعُ الْخِيَانَةُ وَالْأُخُوَّةُ
enWisdom: Treachery and brotherhood do not go together

Wisdom: لَا تَدُومُ مَعَ الْغَدْرِ صُحْبَةُ خَلِيلٍ
enWisdom: With treachery, the companionship of a friend does not last

Wisdom: لَا خَيْرَ فِي صَدِيقٍ ضَنِينٍ
enWisdom: There is no good in a stingy (or suspicious) friend

Wisdom: لَا تَدُومُ عَلَى عَدَمِ الْإِنْصَافِ الْمَوَدَّةُ
enWisdom: Friendship that lacks equity does not last
